entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Jasper
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:24 p.m. MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 12.0Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Jasper Warden Station 10:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023
Temperature: 12.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 58 %
Dewpoint: 4.0°C
Wind: SE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Rain beginning near midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Snow level lowering to 2100 metres overnight. Local smoke. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Showers. High 13.
entry.summary: Showers. Snow level 2100 metres. Amount 5 to 10 mm. High 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers in the evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Snow level 2200 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023
